Text:
function RYU_EP04_05()
    -- .起-3【11月第2週】「姫騎士と姫巫女」
    SaveData.Title = "姫騎士と姫巫女"

    -- //BG：メインストリート（冬・昼）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ The next day, I had already stationed myself near the entrance to the main street early in the morning. ]])

    MSG([[ It was to be the first to speak to Hermes-san as soon as she arrived at school. ]])

    MSG([[ However, my expectations were too naive. ]])

    -- //CI：ゴチャゴチャした人混み、呆れる雑エリカ 087
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI087a")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Even though there was still an hour until classes started, the school gate area was already crowded with a large number of students. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter how much the security guards ordered the crowd to disperse, they didn’t budge. It was no longer something a few security guards could handle. ]])

    MSG([[ Among them were some ordinary fans and what appeared to be reporters, which made me once again realize that Hermes-san is a national idol. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1723.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "T-There are way more people here than I imagined... Hermes-san’s popularity is really amazing." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I sighed, but it was only for a moment. Something even more unexpected than I imagined was about to happen. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- //SE：ヘリの音（小さめ）
PLAY_SE("SEg001.wav")
WAIT(500)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1724.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh. That sound... could it be?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //CI：ヘリコプター 060
    -- //SE：ヘリの音（大きめ）
PLAY_SE("SEg002.wav")
WAIT(500)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI060a")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)


LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0988.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-It really is a helicopterーーーーー!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The same helicopter I saw when I previously encountered Hermes-san flew over us. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ It seemed to descend near the ground as a rope was lowered from the aircraft and a figure slid down energetically. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1726.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh!? C-Could it be!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_BGM("BGM17.wav")
    -- //CG：姫神エルメス登場（屋外ver.）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV006ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0451.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "E-ve-ry-bo-dyーーーーーー<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Sorry to keep you waitingーーーーーー!" ]])
    -- //注釈：\はハート

    MSG([[ Surprisingly, it was Hermes-san who was descending the rope. ]])

    MSG([[ Just like at the entrance ceremony, safety measures were surely in place, but it was way too dynamic. ]])

    MSG([[ Because of such an outrageous way of coming to school, not only I but everyone else stood there stunned. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1407.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Huh!? I can’t just stand here daydreaming! I have to hurry and talk to her." ]])

    -- //BG：グラウンド
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG012aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Coming to my senses, I headed for the grounds. Hermes-san had just successfully landed and was removing her safety gear as she was about to head toward the school building. ]])

    MSG([[ This was the perfect chance. I decided to speak to her while no one had approached her yet. ]])

    -- //BU：エルメス（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1728.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hermes-san, long time no see. There’s something I want to ask you――" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

STOP_BGM(2000)

    -- //BU：エルメス（通常）、ダリア（真剣）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,200,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0482.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I’m sorry, but my princess just came straight to school from an overseas performance. Please do not engage her in conversation." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1729.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "E-Daria-san!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

    MSG([[ Before I realized it, Daria-san had cut in between Hermes-san and me. ]])

    MSG([[ The unexpected arrival of another person naturally confused me. A rush of questions flooded my mind. ]])

    MSG([[ But it was more important to hear about the Princess Election from Hermes-san than from Daria-san, so I decided to avoid Daria-san. ]])

    MSG([[ After faking a glance to the right, I tried to slip past Daria-san on her left―― ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BU：ダリア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,200,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    -- //effect：BU拡大

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0483.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I said, do not engage her in conversation." ]])

    -- //effect：点滅

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1730.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //effct：グラフィックが上下反転
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",300,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG012aa")
    LAYER_ANGLE(LAYER_BG,180)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",300,false)

    MSG([[ Our eyes met, and I felt dazzled; my vision flipped upside down. ]])

    MSG([[ My body was thrown down to the ground―― ]])

    -- //SE：柔らかいものにぶつかる音
PLAY_SE("SEa036.wav")
WAIT(200)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0529.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "—Erika-san!" ]])

    MSG([[ But at that moment, someone caught me. ]])

    MSG([[ I was wrapped in an astonishingly soft feeling and my body almost bounced. ]])

    -- //effct：上下反転なし

    -- //BU：ウラン（真剣）←驚きに変更
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG012aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ It was Uran-san who caught me. My head sank into her ample chest, and no matter how much I struggled, I couldn’t escape. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[ Uran-san gently set my body down on the ground and smiled at me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1731.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0530.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Trying to catch Hermes-sama all by yourself? That’s lonely, isn’t it, Erika-san?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0531.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "We are allies united under Lady Marika’s name, aren’t we? Please rely on us more." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン（真剣）、エルメス（笑顔）、ダリア（真剣）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ba")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0452.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Ah, Uran-chan! Long time no see! How have you been?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0484.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Uran-kun, please stop blocking our way. We are in a hurry." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0532.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh my, do you really have something so important that you have to throw your cute junior aside? That’s not like the Daria I used to know." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0533.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "At least tell us why you were absent. Erika-san and everyone else were genuinely worried about you." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0485.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "That is none of your concern." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0534.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Even though we are fellow 'princesses,' please don’t say such lonely things. Or would you prefer I tell you something that concerns you more?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0535.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "For example... the reason Lady Marika continues to sleep." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0486.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "...!? I have nothing to say about that!" ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san and Daria-san glared at each other. Beside them, I was flustered, not knowing what to do. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,600,0,400,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,300,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0453.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Stop stop! That tense atmosphere is like wasabi and not cute at all, you know?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0454.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Let’s make it all fluffy and fun, okay? Okay?" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-san cut in between the two and gave a cute wink. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[ Because of her adorable act, both Uran-san and Daria-san were bewildered and took a little distance from each other. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0455.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Daria-chan missed a whole month of school. Of course you’re curious about the reasons<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0456.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I’ll properly explain everything to everyone after school today<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Daria-chan, that’s okay, right?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0487.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "W-Wait, Hermes. Your mother has forbidden you to have contact with Erika-kun and the others, hasn’t she?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0457.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "It’s fine, it’s fineー<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Because my mother told me to 'make everyone smile,' right?" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥ハート

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0458.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "It’s an important talk, so she’ll surely allow it<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0488.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "...I can’t win against Hermes." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0489.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Fine. I will explain the situation to our mother. But as promised, you have to be back by 7 PM." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0459.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Thank you, Daria-chan! I love you!" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-san hugged Daria-san tightly and then quickly took a step back and faced us. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0460.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Then, I’ll come to Erika-chan’s classroom after school today! At that time, I’ll tell you everything you want to know<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1732.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-Yes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0536.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Thank you very much, Hermes-sama." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0461.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "See youー<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> After school, okay?<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,800,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)

STOP_BGM(1000)

    MSG([[ After saying that, Hermes-san took Daria-san’s hand and ran toward the school building. ]])

    MSG([[ Left behind, Uran-san and I were too stunned by the unexpected development to move. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1733.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san, thank you for coming. I probably couldn’t have gotten such a promise alone." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0537.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "N-No, it’s really no big deal at all." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0538.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "More than that, I apologize for getting emotional earlier... Thinking that Daria-san was acting behind the scenes, I couldn’t help but let my feelings show." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1734.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Why are you apologizing? Uran-san was really cool back then." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0539.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "...Erika-san, you’re so kind. Hearing that really saves me." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0540.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Anyway, we must make sure to get all the details from Hermes-sama at the meeting after school. Let’s do our best, Erika-san." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1735.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP04_06")
end
